sections.heading: Appraisal of interest and payment upon withdrawal or expulsion of member10-2010
sections.text: Appraisal of interest and payment upon withdrawal or expulsion of memberIf a member withdraws or is expelled, the board of directors shall, within three years after withdrawal or expulsion, equitably appraise his propert
